item.description:
MicroBike is an annual volunteer-led biking event. Held each fall, MicroBike is an opportunity for employees, families or friends of Accion Internationa to get active for microfinance. MicroBikers create rides in their communities to raise awareness and money for Accion, a pioneer and leader in global microfinance.$25 registration fee, $50 per person base goal of fundraising (more is welcome)

Â 

Check out our page and register:

https://www.kintera.org/faf/search/searchTeamPart.asp?ievent=1019294&lis=1&kntae1019294=7344B9A9349949A18BEDE63005AA6101&supId=364643621&team=5171999

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Accion MicroBike
